boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Wings of Glory is a game system that allows players to recreate aerial combat during World War I and II, using cards and miniatures to represent the airplanes and their maneuvers. In Wings of Glory players will control one or more airplanes, taking to the skies to engage their opponents in aerial duels, or trying to accomplish a specific mission, such as recon, escort, or bombing._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Wings of Glory: WW1 Rules and Accessories Pack is a complete game system that includes all the rules and accessories necessary to play the WW1 version of the game system. Players will find the core WW1 rules system presented in a beautiful forty-page color booklet with Basic, Standard, Advanced, and a wealth of Optional rules. Also included are all the rules and counters necessary to use special models (such as multi-engine bombers and balloons) and special weapons (anti-aircraft, rockets and incendiary bullets)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The pack also features four decks of Damage Cards (A, B, C, D); Target, Trench, Machine Gun, Anti Aircraft Guns and Bomb cards; four airplane consoles; two rulers; and counters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Airplane miniatures are not included; the pack must be combined with two or more WW1 Airplane Packs or Special Packs (each featuring a miniature and its maneuver deck), or with a WW1 Duel Pack._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

A complete kit to start you off. The WW1 Ruls and Accessories Pack was only played once, partially punched and complete. Comes with the following miniatures: Halberstadt D.III (Keudell) Fokker A.III (Hautzmayer) Morane-Saulnier Type N (Navarre) Airco DH.2 (Saundby) Only played a couple of times (see pictures) Special Offer. For an extra 7.50 (a total of 30.00) I will throw in a like new copy of Glory III (see the separate listing for photos)
never played. Unpunched. Shrink removed from cards for inspection. Absolutely mint game. Comes from smoke free home in California. Also includes 2 packs of the Aces promo packs
Factory shrinked.

Ares Games (AREWGF002A) Wings of Glory is a game system that allows players to recreate aerial combat during World War I and II, using cards and miniatures to represent the airplanes and their maneuvers. In Wings of Glory players will control one or more airplanes, taking to the skies to engage their opponents in aerial duels, or trying to accomplish a specific mission, such as recon, escort, or bombing. This WW1 Wings of Glory Rules and Accessories Pack is a complete game system, that includes all the rules and accessories necessary to play the WW1 version of the game system. Players will find the core WW1 rules system presented in a beautiful 48-pages color booklet - Basic, Standard, Advanced, and a wealth of Optional rules. Also included are all the rules and counters necessary to use special models (such as multi-engine bombers and balloons) and special weapons (anti-aircraft, rockets and incendiary bullets). The pack also features four decks of Damage Cards (A, B, C, D); Target, Trench, Machine Gun, Anti Aircraft Guns and Bomb cards; four airplane consoles, two rulers and counters. Airplane miniatures are not included - the pack must be combined with two or more WW1 Airplane Packs or Special Packs (each featuring a miniature and its maneuver deck), or with a WW1 Starter Set.
English, French, Italian, Spanish, German edition
Andrew Umbel (Scrunge)
Shrink wrap PayPal or US Postal Money Order Other methods of payment may be accepted but contact me before ordering.

This is a complete set of every series of Wings of War and Wings of Glory. WOW four(4) and WOG four(4) aircraft mode;s and games All in original boxes. All decks sealed except for series 1. The duplicates of series 2 in WOG are not included. Also, in this package are all four of the Giant Bombers (2-Caproni and 2-Gotha) both balloons with rocket-armed Nieuports. All in original packing-decks unopened. Balloon decals not applied. Wings of War Deluxe set-version #1 (unpunched) with 4 planes-unopened decks. All in as new condition. Complete games of Burning Drachens, Famous Aces, Watch Your Back! plus add-on K,L,M decks. in Very Good condition. This is a once in a blue-moon offering including some very rare aircraft models and out of print materials. All mint in original packaging. Many boxes never opened. Current with latest releases up to 2012. 101 model aircraft-2 balloons- 6 boxed games. I will not break up this collection.
